comments.en:
Had trouble finding notes for hl-1020. Documentation was for hl-1020/hl-820.

Followed instructions on this page for hl-820. Works well with gs hl7x0 driver.

SourceForge Foomatic bug #121159 reports that the bl7x0 driver prints with an offset to the right of about half a page. This happens only for printing in the default resolution of 300 dpi. Make sure that GhostScript prints with 600 dpi (option "-r600").
